name: Dojigiri Yasutsuna
ability: Moderately increases damage dealt when one of the Five Swords Under Heaven is on the team.

additional_data.description: Legendary blade that beheaded ruler of demons Shuten Doji. Despite being feared by demons far and wide, Yasutsuna has an unlikely fan in Shuten Doji himself, who was drawn to her bloodlust to end his time as a spirit. Their bad blood forgotten, the two have since developed a deep connection, though some say that Yasutsuna is sucker for her former enemy's capacity to empathize with the less fortunate.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Obtained after clearing Chapter 7.
◦ Available in Jewel Summon after clearing Chapter 7.

skill: "By this steely blade, I shall deal death to all demonkind!"
summon: "The brunt of my blade is reserved for... evil itself."
limit_break: "There is nothing I cannot slice through!"
